Marksman Ambra:
The village of KMail - the main settlement Kamael. For many centuries, they could not leave its limits because of a magic spell. But now, the spell was broken and they move freely.
Now she has turned into quite a noisy place. Other races opened its embassies to facilitate cooperation in the fight against the forces of evil.
This, of course. well, but so much has happened in such a short period of time, so many new people that I was a bit stunned.
